subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Note that <big>涖</big> and {{l|zh|蒞}} are considered {{w|Variant Chinese characters|variant forms}} of {{l|zh|莅}} in mainland China<!-- Refer 1955 《第一批異體字整理表》 and 2013 《通用規范漢字表》 at https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/ --> whereas <big>涖</big> and {{l|zh|莅}} are considered {{w|Variant Chinese characters|variant forms}} of {{l|zh|蒞}} in Taiwan.

subSections.title: References
subSections.text: * {{R:twedu|A03538-001}} <!-- Note: not the same as the one below -->

subSections.title: Definitions
Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|涖涖|涖事|涖卜|涖刑}} <!-- Note: Not a variant form of 蒞. Compounds such as 蒞事|蒞卜|蒞刑 do not exist -->
